column4: ok, this is random, sometimes I boot and it hangs at "Starting AppArmor", other times it will reach the login screen but after logging in the desktop doesn't come up leaving me with a blank wallpaper
how do I switch to tty1 ?
did you try my suggestion or not
you are in unity, with only wallpaper, correct?
though I'm not sure what unity is
I'm suspecting it has something to do with the nvidia driver the monitor settings offers to install?
keep trying to get the gnome terminal either via alt f2 or ctrl alt T, it will show up, eventually
its an easy fix, no need for that
well, it refuses to bring up the terminal no matter what
and sometimes it fails to reach the log in screen (hangs after "Starting AppArmor"
so now, the screen goes purple, ubuntu logo shows, screen flashes black/white a few times, and then some text shows on a black background with the final line "Starting AppArmor profiles"
ah ha, I've found the terminal so what's this fix?
